column2:
"Excellent. I see you're one of the good ones.
My fears were completely unfounded, then."

"You'll need a grinder each time you make
an upgrade, but it's worth the performance
boost you'll get."

"Of course, it could also end in failure.
But only an idiot allows fear to rule their
decisions."
"Heh. This reminds me of this one time, in the old days, when I dropped my grinder into a... "
